title: 40 gas stations closed due to protests and unrest: Association
body_lines: Due to protests and unrest incidents reported at filling stations, a total of 40 filling stations have been closed, the Petroleum Dealers’ Association (PDA) said.

Kapila Naotunna, the association's co-secretary, said most incidents were reported from Gampaha and Kalutara districts and added certain individuals had intimidated the filling station employees to obtain fuel.
Therefore, the fuel orders that were provided for the said filling stations were cancelled, he said. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
